page.title: 05TELEVISION 85
page.content: Television today is much more advanced for instance,programmes are made now for special ages.At twelve o,clock from Monday to Friday programmes are shown for a half hour for the ages 3 to 7 unless it is a bank holiday. Educational programmes are usually shown from 9 to 3 o,clock in the afternoon.The programmes shown from 4 to 5 in the evening are for children about 8 to 15.These programmes include cartoons and quizes,films and the news.In the evening the programmes shown are for adults and teenagers,but sometimes they are suitable for children to watch.On a Saturday morning,the programmes shown are for children.But in the afternoon the programmes are for adults and teenagers as they are only sport programmes.
